医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的流感疫苗策略旨在通过 T 细胞反应增强保护最近的一篇评论强调需要结合 T 细胞和抗体反应的创新流感疫苗，以增强跨毒株和季节的保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/New-influenza-vaccine-strategies-aim-to-enhance-protection-with-T-cell-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/New-influenza-vaccine-strategies-aim-to-enhance-protection-with-T-cell-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=299582b8-114c-4653-a70c-e3b73e1272c8 Mon, 06 May 2024 00:13:00 -0400 New influenza vaccine strategies aim to enhance protection with T-cell responses
宠物生肉饮食与耐药细菌有关，引发对公共健康风险的担忧研究表明，与传统加工的宠物食品不同，生肉宠物食品（RMBD）通常含有多重耐药细菌，对宠物和人类都构成重大健康风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/Raw-meat-based-diet-for-pets-linked-to-drug-pressive-bacteria-prompting-concerns-over-public-health-risks。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/Raw-meat-based-diet-for-pets-linked-to-drug-pressive-bacteria-prompting-concerns-over-public-health-risks。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbf00e54-5f44-48af-8ae1-e75b4079eeff Sun, 05 May 2024 23:51:00 -0400 Raw meat-based diet for pets linked to drug-resistant bacteria, prompting concerns over public health risks
野生苏门答腊猩猩用药用植物治疗面部伤口研究人员记录了首例观察到的野生苏门答腊猩猩主动使用药用植物治疗伤口的案例，为非人类物种自我药疗的起源提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/Wild-Sumatran-orangutan-uses-medicinal-plant-to-treat-facial-wound.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/Wild-Sumatran-orangutan-uses-medicinal-plant-to-treat-facial-wound.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b54222e8-8205-4b9c-82ae-539c985244a2 Sun, 05 May 2024 23:28:00 -0400 Wild Sumatran orangutan uses medicinal plant to treat facial wound
男性和女性疾病负担主要原因的差异最近的一项研究表明，男性总体上承受着更高的疾病负担，而女性在七种特定条件下承受着更高的负担，这强调了有必要采取量身定制的健康干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/Differences-in-leading-causes-of-disease-burden- Between-males-and-females.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/Differences-in-leading-causes-of-disease-burden- Between-males-and-females.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a693ca3b-8853-4723-ae79-3fd4e6580de9 Sun, 05 May 2024 23:16:00 -0400 Differences in leading causes of disease burden between males and females
评估 ChatGPT 从临床记录中提取结构化数据研究人员评估了 ChatGPT 从非结构化临床记录中提取结构化数据的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/Evaluating-ChatGPT-for-structed-data-extraction-from-clinical-notes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/Evaluating-ChatGPT-for-structed-data-extraction-from-clinical-notes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5ad5798-202b-4dc7-8fe8-9689ec85fa34 Sun, 05 May 2024 22:56:00 -0400 Evaluating ChatGPT for structured data extraction from clinical notes
研究发现在资源有限的环境中液化石油气烹饪对胎儿生长没有好处尽管减少了空气污染的暴露，但一项研究发现，在资源有限的环境中，与传统生物质燃料相比，在烹饪中使用液化石油气（LPG）并不能改善胎儿的生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/Study-finds-no-fetal-growth-benefits-from-LPG-cooking-in-resource-limited-settings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/Study-finds-no-fetal-growth-benefits-from-LPG-cooking-in-resource-limited-settings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adc435d5-11a1-4b8f-8127-656c2d047c39 Sun, 05 May 2024 22:44:00 -0400 Study finds no fetal growth benefits from LPG cooking in resource-limited settings
新研究显示年龄、性别、种族对于预测老年人的死亡风险至关重要研究发现，LS7 和 LE8 评分在预测全因死亡率和心血管死亡率方面对美国整体人口具有相似的功效。然而，PCE 评分更能预测 40 至 79 岁人群的死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/New-study-shows-age-sex-race-crucial-for-predicting-mortality-risks-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/New-study-shows-age-sex-race-crucial-for-predicting-mortality-risks-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=082a616d-4dfa-40fe-984a-5f047c5fef7e Sun, 05 May 2024 20:40:00 -0400 New study shows age, sex, race crucial for predicting mortality risks in older adults
探索 COVID-19 对身体成分的长期影响COVID-19 也可能影响身体成分，即使是那些没有感染的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/Long-term-impact-of-COVID-19-on-body-composition-explored.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/Long-term-impact-of-COVID-19-on-body-composition-explored.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd95deac-9364-4129-ab3d-817922101900 Sun, 05 May 2024 19:45:00 -0400 Long-term impact of COVID-19 on body composition explored
高脂肪饮食加速大鼠衰老相关记忆丧失研究发现，高脂肪饮食会加剧大鼠与年龄相关的认知能力下降，即使将小胶质细胞从方程中去除，这表明其他途径可能发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/High-fat-diet-accelerates-aging-lated-memory-loss-in-rats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/High-fat-diet-accelerates-aging-lated-memory-loss-in-rats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75e221cd-46df-4b9c-ab33-4060b60b586a Sun, 05 May 2024 19:35:00 -0400 High-fat diet accelerates aging-related memory loss in rats
滑板车伤害上升：牙医警告电动滑板车事故呈上升趋势研究发现，从 2020 年到 2022 年，英国与电动滑板车相关的牙齿伤害显着增加，其中无端跌倒是最常见的原因，许多伤害与缺乏头盔和中毒有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/Rising-scooter-injuries-Dentists-warn-of-having-trend-in-e-scooter-accidents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/Rising-scooter-injuries-Dentists-warn-of-having-trend-in-e-scooter-accidents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f30072ba-2573-4bb6-bec0-fab6860689b4 Sun, 05 May 2024 19:26:00 -0400 Rising scooter injuries: Dentists warn of growing trend in e-scooter accidents
